metadataAttributes.Title: Predictive Analytics for Business
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn to apply predictive analytics and business intelligence to solve real-world business problems
metadataAttributes.Skills: Univariate Time-Series Analysis, Analytic Frameworks, Data Cleaning, CRISP-DM, ETL, Types of Data, Linear Regression, k-means Clustering, Cluster Validation, ARIMA, A/B Testing, Interpreting Test Results, Experiment control, Tableau Visualizations
